summary: This document is a brief email chain from March 2019 regarding the transmission of an award document. It involves an Engineering Technician at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, a Federal Bureau of Prisons facility, and references sending the document to an entity named Signet. The correspondence appears to be administrative in nature.

persons.name: Engineering Technician
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as an Engineering Technician at MCC New York, which is part of the Federal Bureau of Prisons. They are following up on a project and coordinating the sending of an award document.

events.title: Email Follow-up on Award Document
events.description: An Engineering Technician at MCC New York sends a follow-up email regarding a project, referencing a previously sent award document from September and stating it needs to be sent to Signet.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 3, 2019, from an Engineering Technician at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.
It references an 'award document' that was previously sent in September and needs to be sent to an entity named 'Signet'.
MCC New York is a Federal Bureau of Prisons facility, which is relevant as it was the location where Jeffrey Epstein was held following his 2019 arrest.
